definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: move gently, glide, glide over (NH [[דָּבַב]] flow slowly, drop; Ar. dab=a walk leisurely, gently, da0b=ah;un any animal that walks or creeps, cf. [[דּׂב]]; As. dabâbu, plot, plan, COT:Gloss, cf. [[דִּבָּה]])—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[דּוֹבֵב שִׂפְתֵי יְשֵׁנִים]] Ct So 7:10, of wine gliding over the lips of sleepers; ([[שְׂפָתַי וְשִׁנׇּי֑]] ´[[ד]] i.e. my lips and teeth LXX SyrVer Aq Gei:Urschrift 405).
